forbidden_tracked_path_regexes.message: Backup/patch artefacts must not be tracked; delete or move them under tmp/ and keep them untracked.
Backup-suffixed artefacts (*_bak.*) must not be tracked; delete them or rename to a real versioned asset.
Standalone tooling apps must live under tooling/apps/ (no package.json outside tooling/apps/).

scripts_root_message: scripts/ root must contain only README.md; move ad-hoc scripts into an appropriate scripts/ subfolder.
